definition: Individuals who have completed a course of study at a school, college, or university.
example: The company is looking to hire recent graduates.
example_translation: Firma szuka do zatrudnienia świeżych absolwentów.

definition: Formal qualifications obtained through examinations and certificates.
example: He has all the necessary paper qualifications for the job.
example_translation: Ma wszystkie niezbędne kwalifikacje papierowe do tej pracy.

definition: Formal credentials in a particular field of study or profession.
example: She has qualifications in engineering.
example_translation: Ma kwalifikacje w zakresie inżynierii.

definition: Practical experience gained from working in a particular job or field.
example: He has five years of work experience in marketing.
example_translation: Ma pięć lat doświadczenia zawodowego w marketingu.

definition: To provide someone with the skills and knowledge needed for a specific job.
example: The company will train you for this particular job.
example_translation: Firma przeszkoli Cię do tej określonej pracy.

definition: The process of finding and hiring new employees.
example: The company is actively looking for new recruits.
example_translation: Firma aktywnie poszukuje nowych rekrutów.

word: Graduated from x with a degree in
translation: ukończenie studiów x z dyplomem w zakresie
definition: To complete a course of study at a university or college and receive a degree in a specific field.
example: He graduated from Harvard with a degree in economics.
example_translation: Ukończył studia na Harvardzie z dyplomem w zakresie ekonomii.

definition: The process of learning the skills needed for a particular job or activity.
example: She received training in project management.
example_translation: Otrzymała szkolenie w zakresie zarządzania projektami.

definition: To learn or be taught the skills and knowledge needed for a particular job or activity.
example: He is training as a software developer.
example_translation: Szkolenie jako programista.

definition: To achieve the necessary skills and knowledge to be recognized as a professional in a particular field.
example: She qualified as a nurse last year.
example_translation: Zakwalifikowała się jako pielęgniarka w zeszłym roku.

definition: By means of; as a result of.
example: He got the job through a recruitment agency.
example_translation: Dostał pracę poprzez agencję rekrutacyjną.

definition: Training provided by an employer to its employees within the organization.
example: The company offers in-house training for new employees.
example_translation: Firma oferuje szkolenie wewnętrzne dla nowych pracowników.

definition: A series of lessons or lectures on a particular subject.
example: He is taking courses in computer science.
example_translation: Uczestniczy w kursach informatycznych.

definition: The process of improving the skills and knowledge of managers.
example: The program focuses on management development.
example_translation: Program koncentruje się na rozwoju zarządzania.

definition: To continue or proceed to the next stage of an activity.
example: She decided to go on to graduate school.
example_translation: Zdecydowała się kontynuować naukę na studiach podyplomowych.

definition: To gain practical knowledge or skill in a particular area.
example: He is looking to acquire experience in finance.
example_translation: Stara się zdobyć doświadczenie w finansach.

definition: An advanced university degree after a bachelor's degree.
example: She is pursuing a master's degree in psychology.
example_translation: Studiuje na studiach magisterskich z psychologii.

definition: Advanced academic programs beyond a bachelor's degree.
example: He enrolled in graduate studies in physics.
example_translation: Zapisał się na studia podyplomowe z fizyki.

definition: Beyond the basic level; higher in complexity.
example: She is taking an advanced course in mathematics.
example_translation: Uczestniczy w zaawansowanym kursie matematyki.

definition: The ability to do something well, usually gained through training or experience.
example: He has excellent communication skills.
example_translation: Ma doskonałe umiejętności komunikacyjne.

definition: A specific talent or proficiency in a certain area.
example: She has a particular ability to solve complex problems.
example_translation: Ma szczególną zdolność do rozwiązywania skomplikowanych problemów.

definition: Having a methodical and systematic approach; well-organized.
example: He is known for his methodical, systematic, and organized work style.
example_translation: Jest znany ze swojej metodyczności, systematyczności i zorganizowania w pracy.

definition: Having the ability to use computers efficiently.
example: All our staff members are computer-literate.
example_translation: Wszyscy nasi pracownicy mają umiejętność obsługi komputera.

definition: Having basic knowledge of mathematics; able to perform simple mathematical calculations.
example: Candidates must be numerate and have good analytical skills.
example_translation: Kandydaci muszą mieć umiejętność liczenia i dobre zdolności analityczne.

definition: Having a strong reason to act or accomplish something.
example: The team is highly motivated to achieve their goals.
example_translation: Zespół jest bardzo zmotywowany do osiągnięcia swoich celów.

definition: Having a natural aptitude or skill.
example: She is a talented musician.
example_translation: Jest utalentowaną muzyczką.

definition: People who are motivated to work on their own initiative.
example: We are looking for self-starters who can manage their own projects.
example_translation: Szukamy samodzielnych osób, które mogą zarządzać własnymi projektami.

definition: Taking action and making changes before they need to be made.
example: She is proactive in identifying and solving problems.
example_translation: Jest proaktywna w identyfikowaniu i rozwiązywaniu problemów.

definition: Driven by one's own desire to achieve or succeed.
example: He is a self-motivated individual who always strives for the best.
example_translation: Jest osobą zmotywowaną, która zawsze dąży do najlepszego.

definition: Motivated to achieve goals through one's own efforts.
example: She is self-driven and highly ambitious.
example_translation: Jest samodzielnie zmotywowana i bardzo ambitna.

definition: People who work well as part of a team.
example: We need team players who can collaborate effectively.
example_translation: Potrzebujemy graczy zespołowych, którzy potrafią efektywnie współpracować.

definition: The profession or duties of an accountant.
example: She works in accountancy.
example_translation: Pracuje w księgowości.

definition: Regarded or viewed in a certain way.
example: They are considered to be experts in their field.
example_translation: Są uważani za ekspertów w swojej dziedzinie.

definition: Having or requiring a high level of skill.
example: He is a highly skilled technician.
example_translation: Jest wysoce wykwalifikowanym technikiem.

definition: Having the ability to do something well.
example: The company needs skilled workers.
example_translation: Firma potrzebuje wykwalifikowanych pracowników.

definition: Having some training or skills, but not at a high level.
example: The factory employs semi-skilled laborers.
example_translation: Fabryka zatrudnia średnio wykwalifikowanych pracowników.

definition: Not having or requiring special skills or training.
example: The job requires unskilled labor.
example_translation: Praca wymaga niewykwalifikowanej siły roboczej.
